title: Build My World
description: A new job. A new life. A new love. Casey Russo needs a change. Her husband is gone and building a new life for herself seems like the only thing to do. She never expects to wind up on a whirlwind tour with the world's hottest pop group, Quintessential.When a romance with singer Michael Brooks heats up, Casey learns that she can't run from her past and secrets never stay secret.
author: Rebecca Abbott Miller
